episode_event_general_ch0130_00_serena/6: Back in Kalos, I used to make desserts a lot.

Eating desserts fills people with joy and brings
everyone closer together, don’t you think?
Yes, I do! It’s so wonderful!
I’d love to try your desserts sometime.

Hehe. Then maybe we should have ourselves an
impromptu dessert party.

How about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Would you like to help us put this together?
episode_event_general_ch0130_00_serena/4:
It’s been a while since I
made any desserts...

Eating desserts can fill people and Pokémon alike
with joy, don’t you think?

There’s nothing better than a sweet treat after a
Pokémon battle.

Ack! Just thinking about it makes me wish I had
some desserts right now!
